text:
the method SVGGeneratorContext.doubleString will throw a NullPointerException
on the first call if no call to SVGGeneratorContext.setPrecision has been made.

This is because the decimalPrecision member is not initialized.

workaround: call setPrecision(int); before generating output.

I'd create a patch, but I don't know what the default precision should be...
